LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedRest.stages.0.label: A little tired
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedRest.stages.0.description: Aw... Could I use a nap...
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedRest.stages.1.label: Be exhausted
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedRest.stages.1.description: I want to go to sleep with my tail between my legs... just for a little while...
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedRest.stages.2.label: No..powerrrrrr...
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedRest.stages.2.description: Ah Ah AH AH AH, my feet are weak, too weak to stand, I WANT TO SLEEP AH! ! ！! !
